meanings.sent1: She decided to remakes her drawing to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He often remakes his bed in the morning to keep it neat.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally remakes the same dish twice, forgetting he already made it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile remakes the room, brightening everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The artist remakes the painting with new colors, transforming its look completely.

meanings.definition: A new version of a previously made film or song.
meanings.sent1: The studio released several remakes of classic movies this year.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the original film over the remakes that came out recently.
meanings.sent3: The audience eagerly awaited the latest remake of their favorite childhood movie.
meanings.sent4: The remake of the song gave it a modern twist, appealing to younger listeners.
meanings.sent5: The remake of the classic film brought a fresh perspective to the story.
